attributes.action: Stop the making of Jade Goody The Musical
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersinged feel that enough publicity has been given to this person who for no good reason (apart from the last moments where she highlighted cancer) has been in teh media far too much. 
We feel that the making of a musical of her life is in not just in bad taste but also a waste of media attention where the plight of millions is ignored by this (previous) waste of space

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
